text: 61|5|musa tanre janatayeat iprakaram paranna sandarbham (srad'dheyamakunnu:) enre janannale, ninnal entinan enne upadravikkunnatâ€Œ? nan ninnalilekkulla allahuvinre dutananenn ninnalkkariyamallea. annane avar terriyappeal allahu avarute hrdayannale terriccukalannu. allahu durmargikalaya janannale nervaliyilakkukayilla
